translations.msgstr: The date when this ban should be automatically removed (format: yyyy-mm-dd). Leave blank to remove manually.
A message that will be displayed to the banned user when he/she visits the board.
You should be very careful when banning an IP-range because of the possibility of multiple users matching the same partial IP.
Click %s to see IP statistics for this user.
Supplement ban with IP and email
The IP address or IP-ranges you wish to ban (e.g. 150.11.110.1 or 150.11.110). Separate addresses with spaces. If an IP is entered already it is the last known IP of this user in the database.
The email or email domain you wish to ban (e.g. someone@somewhere.com or somewhere.com). See "Allow banned email addresses" in Permissions for more info.
Search for bans in the database. You can enter one or more terms to search for. Wildcards in the form of asterisks (*) are accepted. To show all bans leave all fields empty.
The username to ban (case-insensitive). The next page will let you enter a custom IP and email. If you just want to ban a specific IP/IP-range or email just leave it blank.
The format should be YYYY-MM-DD and the date must be at least one day in the future.
You entered an invalid expire date.
The email address (e.g. user@domain.com) or partial email address domain (e.g. domain.com) you entered is invalid.
The guest user cannot be banned.
The user %s is a moderator and can't be banned. If you want to ban a moderator, you must first demote him/her.
You must enter either a username, an IP address or an email address (at least).
The user %s is an administrator and can't be banned. If you want to ban an administrator, you must first demote him/her.
No user by that ID registered.
No user by that username registered. If you want to add a ban not tied to a specific username just leave the username blank.
I hereby acknowledge that all category data will be deleted
The name of the new category you want to add. You can edit the name of the category later (see below). Go to %s to add forums to your new category.
Position must be a positive integer value.
You must confirm the deletion by checking the box
Are you sure that you want to delete the category %s?
Delete category (together with all forums and posts it contains)
You must enter a name for the category

Enter a word that you want to censor and the replacement text for this word. Wildcards are accepted (i.e. *some* would match somewhere and lonesome). Censor words also affect usernames. New users will not be able to register with usernames containing any censored words. The search is case insensitive.
You must enter a word to censor.
Нет такого плагина %s в директории плагинов.

In this form, you can set the forum specific permissions for the different user groups. If you haven't made any changes to this forum's group permissions, what you see below is the default based on settings in %s. Administrators always have full permissions and are thus excluded. Permission settings that differ from the default permissions for the user group are marked red. The "Read forum" permission checkbox will be disabled if the group in question lacks the "Read board" permission. For redirect forums, only the "Read forum" permission is editable.
Edit group permissions for this forum
WARNING! Deleting a forum will delete all posts (if any) in that forum!
Are you sure that you want to delete the forum %s?
Select the category to which you wish to add a new forum.
You must enter a valid category
You must enter a forum name.
Position must be a positive integer value.

Please note that in order for a user in this group to have moderator abilities, he/she must be assigned to moderate one or more forums. This is done via the user administration page of the user's profile.
Number of seconds that users in this group have to wait between reports. Set to 0 to disable.
Number of seconds that users in this group have to wait between emails. Set to 0 to disable.
Number of seconds that users in this group have to wait between searches. Set to 0 to disable.
Number of seconds that users in this group have to wait between posts. Set to 0 to disable.
Allow users in this group to send e-mails to other users.
Allow users in this group to freetext search for users in the user list.
Allow users in this group to use the search feature.
Allow users in this group to set their own user title.
Allow users in this group to include links in their posts. This setting also applies to signatures and the website field in users' profiles.
Allow users in this group to delete their own topics (including any replies).
Allow users in this group to delete their own posts.
Allow users in this group to edit their own posts.
Allow users in this group to post new topics.
Allow users in this group to post replies in topics.
Allow users to view the user list and user profiles.

Allow users in this group to view the board. This setting applies to every aspect of the board and can therefore not be overridden by forum specific settings. If this is set to "No", users in this group will only be able to login/logout and register.
If moderator privileges are enabled, allow users in this group to ban users.
If moderator privileges are enabled, allow users in this group to promote users.
If moderator privileges are enabled, allow users in this group to change user passwords.
If moderator privileges are enabled, allow users in this group to rename users.
Allow moderators to edit user profiles
If moderator privileges are enabled, allow users in this group to edit user profiles.
In order for a user in this group to have moderator abilities, he/she must be assigned to moderate one or more forums. This is done via the user administration page of the user's profile.

You can promote users to a new group automatically if they reach a certain number of posts. Select "%s" to disable. For security reasons, you are not allowed to select an administrator group here. Also note that group changes for users affected by this setting will take effect immediately. Note that the amount of posts you enter is the total amount of posts of a user, not the amount of posts made as a member of this group.
The rank users in this group have attained. Leave blank to use default title ("%s").
Below options and permissions are the default permissions for the user group. These options apply if no forum specific permissions are in effect.
The group %s currently has %s members. Please select a group to which these members will be assigned upon deletion.
Are you sure that you want to delete the group %s?
WARNING! After you deleted a group you cannot restore it.

The pre-defined groups Guests, Administrators, Moderators and Members cannot be removed. However, they can be edited. Please note that in some groups, some options are unavailable (e.g. the edit posts permission for guests). Administrators always have full permissions.
This is the default user group, e.g. the group users are placed in when they register. For security reasons, users can't be placed in either the moderator or administrator user groups by default.
Select a user group from which the new group will inherit its permission settings. The next page will let you fine-tune its settings.
The default group cannot be removed. In order to delete this group, you must first setup a different group as the default.
There is already a group with the title %s.
You must enter a group title.
The PHP function phpinfo() has been disabled on this server.
The install folder still exists, but should be removed. %s.
Set up user groups and promotions.
Control permissions for users and guests.
Welcome to the FeatherBB administration control panel. From here you can control vital aspects of the board. Depending on whether you are an administrator or a moderator you can:
Could not remove install.php. Please do so by hand.
You are running the latest version of FeatherBB.
A new version of FeatherBB has been released. You can download the latest version at %s.
Unable to check for upgrade since 'allow_url_fopen' is disabled on this system.
Check for upgrade failed for unknown reasons.
Are you sure that you want to prune all topics older than %s days from %s (%s topics).
WARNING! Pruning posts deletes them permanently.
The forum from which you want to prune posts.
Use this feature with caution. Pruned posts can never be recovered. For best performance, you should put the forum in %s during pruning.
When enabled, sticky topics will also be pruned.
The number of days "old" a topic must be to be pruned. E.g. if you were to enter 30, every topic that didn't contain a post dated less than 30 days old would be deleted.
Days to prune must be a positive integer value.
There are no topics that are %s days old. Please decrease the value of "Days old" and try again.
Posts per cycle must be a positive integer value.
Rebuilding index. This might be a good time to put on some coffee :-)
Select this if you want the search index to be emptied before rebuilding (see below).

Once the process has completed, you will be redirected back to this page. It is highly recommended that you have JavaScript enabled in your browser during rebuilding (for automatic redirect when a cycle has completed). If you are forced to abort the rebuild process, make a note of the last processed post ID and enter that ID+1 in "Starting post ID" when/if you want to continue ("Empty index" must not be selected).

The number of posts to process per pageview. E.g. if you were to enter 300, three hundred posts would be processed and then the page would refresh. This is to prevent the script from timing out during the rebuild process.
The post ID to start rebuilding at. The default value is the first available ID in the database. Normally you wouldn't want to change this.

If you've added, edited or removed posts manually in the database or if you're having problems searching, you should rebuild the search index. For best performance, you should put the forum in %s during rebuilding. Rebuilding the search index can take a long time and will increase server load during the rebuild process!

The message that will be displayed to users when the board is in maintenance mode. If left blank, a default message will be used. This text will not be parsed like regular posts and thus may contain HTML.

When enabled, the board will only be available to administrators. This should be used if the board needs to be taken down temporarily for maintenance. WARNING! Do not log out when the board is in maintenance mode. You will not be able to login again.
This text will not be parsed like regular posts and thus may contain HTML.
Enable this to display the below message in the board.
Hide email address and disallow form email.
Hide email address but allow form e-mail.
Display email address to other users.
Choose the default privacy setting for new user registrations.

Here you can enter any rules or other information that the user must review and accept when registering. If you enabled rules above you have to enter something here, otherwise it will be disabled. This text will not be parsed like regular posts and thus may contain HTML.
When enabled, users must agree to a set of rules when registering (enter text below). The rules will always be available through a link in the navigation table at the top of every page.
If enabled, FluxBB will notify users on the mailing list (see above) when a new user registers in the forums.

When enabled, users are emailed a random password when they register. They can then log in and change the password in their profile if they see fit. This feature also requires users to verify new email addresses if they choose to change from the one they registered with. This is an effective way of avoiding registration abuse and making sure that all users have "correct" email addresses in their profiles.
Controls whether this board accepts new registrations. Disable only under special circumstances.
Encrypts the connection to the SMTP server using SSL. Should only be used if your SMTP server requires it and your version of PHP supports SSL.
Password for SMTP server. Only enter a password if it is required by the SMTP server (most servers do not require authentication). Please enter your password twice to confirm.
Check this if you want to change or delete the currently stored password.
Username for SMTP server. Only enter a username if it is required by the SMTP server (most servers do not require authentication).

The address of an external SMTP server to send emails with. You can specify a custom port number if the SMTP server doesn't run on the default port 25 (example: mail.myhost.com:3580). Leave blank to use the local mail program.
Enable users to subscribe to topics (receive email when someone replies).
Enable users to subscribe to forums (receive email when someone creates a new topic).
This is the address that all emails sent by the board will be addressed from.
The email address of the board administrator.
The maximum allowed size of avatars in bytes (10240 is recommended).
The maximum allowed height of avatars in pixels (60 is recommended).
The maximum allowed width of avatars in pixels (60 is recommended).
The upload directory for avatars (relative to the web(public) root directory). PHP must have write permissions to this directory.
A comma separated list of subscribers. The people on this list are the recipients of reports.
When enabled, users will be able to upload an avatar which will be displayed under their title.

Select the method for handling topic/post reports. You can choose whether topic/post reports should be handled by the internal report system, emailed to the addresses on the mailing list (see below) or both.
Feeds can be cached to lower the resource usage of feeds.
Select the type of syndication feed to display. Note: Choosing none will not disable feeds, only hide them by default.

By entering HTML hyperlinks into this textbox, any number of items can be added to the navigation menu at the top of all pages. The format for adding new links is X = <a href="URL">LINK</a> where X is the position at which the link should be inserted (e.g. 0 to insert at the beginning and 2 to insert after "User list"). Separate entries with a linebreak.
When disabled, searches will only be allowed in one forum at a time. Disable if server load is high due to excessive searching.

If enabled, FluxBB will gzip the output sent to browsers. This will reduce bandwidth usage, but use a little more CPU. This feature requires that PHP is configured with zlib (--with-zlib). Note: If you already have one of the Apache modules mod_gzip or mod_deflate set up to compress PHP scripts, you should disable this feature.
Enable the quick jump (jump to forum) drop list.
Keep track of the number of views a topic has. Disable if you are experiencing high server load in a busy forum.
Allow users to attach a signature to their posts.
This feature displays a dot in front of topics in Forum.php in case the currently logged in user has posted in that topic earlier. Disable if you are experiencing high server load.
Enable this to censor specific words in the board. See %s for more info.
Display info on the index page about guests and registered users currently browsing the board.
When enabled, FluxBB will add a quick reply form at the bottom of topics. This way users can post directly from the topic view.
The maximum times a [quote] tag can go inside other [quote] tags, any tags deeper than this will be discarded.
If set to 8, a regular tab will be used when displaying text within the [code][/code] tag. Otherwise this many spaces will be used to indent the text.
The default number of posts to display per page in a topic. Users can personalize this setting.
Maximum number of posts to display when posting (newest first). Set to 0 to disable.
The default number of topics to display per page in a forum. Users can personalize this setting.
When enabled, FluxBB will automatically detect any URLs in posts and make them clickable hyperlinks.
Convert smilies to small graphic icons.
Convert smilies to small graphic icons in user signatures.
Show the number of posts a user has made (affects topic view, profile and user list).
Show information about the poster under the username in topic view. The information affected is location, register date, post count and the contact links (email and URL).
Number of seconds a user must be idle before being removed from the online users list.
Number of seconds to wait when redirecting. If set to 0, no redirect page will be displayed (not recommended).
Show FluxBB version number in footer.
Number of seconds a user must be idle before his/hers last visit data is updated (primarily affects new message indicators).
The default style for guests and users who haven't changed from the default in their profile.
The default language for guests and users who haven't changed from the default in their profile. If you remove a language pack, this must be updated.
Check if daylight savings is in effect (advances times by 1 hour).
The default time zone for guests and users attempting to register for the board.

Your installation does not support automatic conversion of internationalized domain names. As your base URL contains special characters, you must use an online converter in order to avoid "Bad referer" errors.

The complete URL of the board without trailing slash (i.e. http://www.mydomain.com/forums). This must be correct in order for all admin and moderator features to work. If you get "Bad referer" errors, it's probably incorrect.
A short description of this bulletin board (shown at the top of every page). This field may contain HTML.
The title of this bulletin board (shown at the top of every page). This field may not contain HTML.
The value of "Timeout online" must be smaller than the value of "Timeout visit".
The forums are temporarily down for maintenance. Please try again in a few minutes.
You need to enter the SMTP password twice exactly the same to change it.
The webmaster email address you entered is invalid.
The admin email address you entered is invalid.
You must enter a board title.

Bad HTTP_REFERER. If you have moved these forums from one location to another or switched domains, you need to update the Base URL manually in the database (look for o_base_url in the config table) and then clear the cache by deleting all .php files in the /cache directory.
Smiley upload failed. No temporary folder.
Smiley upload failed. Cannot write file to disk.
Smiley upload failed. File only partially uploaded.
Smiley upload failed. File is too big.
Smiley upload failed. File type is not an image.
Smiley upload failed. Unable to move to smiley folder.

Default pixel width and height for new visual media objects (images, videos etc). When a post has an IMG tag and the "Validate remote IMG" option is turned on, then the remote file information is scaled to fit within these dimensions and retain the original aspect ratio.

Maximum remote image filesize to be allowed on forum pages. When creating a new post, the remote image file size is checked against this value and reported as an error if it is too big and image validation is on.
Percent size adjustment for smiley box dimensions (default 160% == 24x24 pixels).

When posting a message having IMG tags, validate the existence of the remote image files by requesting their file header information. Check each remote image filesize and do NOT display if too big (to save the forum viewer's bandwidth). If any image has a dimension greater than "Max width" or "Max height", then limit the displayed image to fit. (Note that this option is disabled if the PHP variable "allow_url_fopen" is FALSE.)
Maximum pixel width and height allowable for new visual media objects (images, videos etc).
Display images and also make each image a clickable link to the full sized original.

Make the "Poster wrote:" citation text a link back to the original post for quotes having original post number metadata included in the tag attribute (the post number, preceded by a: '#', is specified at the end of the attribute like so: "[quote=Admin #101]...[/quote]").

Display images contained within QUOTE tags. If this option is set to "No" (the default setting), then images within a quote are not displayed graphically but are instead displayed as a simple text hyperlink to the image (with the link text set to: "{IMG}"). If this option is set to "Yes", then images within quotes are displayed normally (as a graphic object).

Enable some textile tag keystroke shortcuts: _emphasized_, *strong*, @inline code@, super^script^, sub~script~, -deleted- and +inserted+ text. Textile shortcuts for bulleted (*) and numbered (#) lists are also supported. When posting a new message, (or editing an existing one), during the pre-parsing phase, the textile shortcut delimiters are converted to their equivalent BBCode tags before being stored in the database.
Select a style sheet file from this list of currently installed SyntaxHighlighter files.
Parser Options, BBCodes and Smilies successfully reset to FluxBB default settings.
Controls whether users should be allowed to register with an email address that another user already has. If allowed, an alert email will be sent to the mailing list if a duplicate is detected.
The maximum number of lines a user signature may contain.

Allow users to register with or change to a banned email address/domain. If left at its default setting (yes), this action will be allowed, but an alert email will be sent to the mailing list (an effective way of detecting multiple registrations).
The maximum number of characters a user signature may contain.
Allow a signature to contain only capital letters.
Allow the BBCode [img][/img] tag in user signatures (not recommended).
Require guests to supply an email address when posting.
Allow a message to contain only capital letters.
Allow a subject to contain only capital letters.
Allow the BBCode [img][/img] tag in posts.
The supplied IP address could not be found in the database.
The supplied IP address is not correctly formatted.
There are currently no posts by that user in the forum.
Find more users for this ip
The IP address to search for in the post database.
Search for users in the database. You can enter one or more terms to search for. Wildcards in the form of asterisks (*) are accepted.
The format should be YYYY-MM-DD and the date must be at least one day in the future.
You entered an invalid expire date.
Also ban the IP addresses of the banned users to make registering a new account more difficult for them.
The date when these bans should be automatically removed (format: yyyy-mm-dd). Leave blank to remove manually.
A message that will be displayed to the banned users when they visit the board.
Warning! Deleted users and/or posts cannot be restored. If you choose not to delete the posts made by these users, the posts can only be deleted manually at a later time.
Delete any posts and topics these users have made.
Please confirm that you want to delete these users.
Select the group to which the selected users will be moved. For security reasons, it is not possible to move multiple users to the administrator group.
Moderators cannot be banned. In order to ban moderators, you must first move them to a different user group.
Administrators cannot be banned. In order to ban administrators, you must first move them to a different user group.
Administrators cannot be deleted. In order to delete administrators, you must first move them to a different user group.
For security reasons, you are not allowed to move multiple administrators to another group. If you want to move these administrators, you can do so on their respective user profiles.
You entered a non-numeric value into a numeric only column.
You answered incorrectly to the "Human or Robot" question.
Please respond with a number to the question: %s
Checking if this is requested by a real person and not an automated program.
Искать темы с новыми сообщениями с Вашего последнего визита.
Unable to read remote image http headers.
Orphan close tag: (/%s) is missing its open tag.
Orphan open tag: (%s) is missing its close tag.
Image display not currently enabled in this context
Remote url does not have Content-Type: "image".
Unable to retrieve image data from remote url: %s
Unable to determine remote file size.
(%s) was opened within itself, this is not allowed.
(%1$s) was opened within (%2$s), this is not allowed.
(%1$s) cannot be within: (%2$s). Allowable parent tags: %3$s.
You are not allowed to post links
(%1$s) tag nesting depth: %2$d exceeds allowable limit: %3$d.
Attribute may NOT contain open or close bbcode tags
Unrecognized attribute: "%1$s", is not valid for (%2$s).
(%s) Message is too long or too complex. Please shorten.
Напишите ваше сообщение и нажмите отправить
Перейти к первому сообщению этой темы.
is a required field in this form.
The email address you entered is invalid.
Click here if you do not want to wait any longer (or if your browser does not automatically forward you)
The administrator or moderator that banned you left the following message:
Please direct any inquiries to the forum administrator at
The ban expires at the end of
You are banned from this forum.
Unable to process user include %s from template %s. There is no such file in neither the template directory nor in the user include directory
Unable to process user include %s from template %s. Directory traversal is not allowed
Unable to process user include %s from template %s. "%s" files are not allowed
You appear to have logged in successfully, however a cookie has not been set. Please check your settings and if applicable, enable cookies for this website.

Bad HTTP_REFERER. You were referred to this page from an unauthorized source. If the problem persists please make sure that 'Base URL' is correctly set in Admin/Options and that you are visiting the forum by navigating to that URL. More information regarding the referrer check can be found in the FluxBB documentation.
You do not have permission to access this page.
Bad request. The link you followed is incorrect or outdated.
You do not have permission to view these forums.
The post you have chosen to delete is set out below for you to review before proceeding.
Warning! This is the first post in the topic, the whole topic will be permanently deleted.
You are about to permanently delete this post.
Вы уже подписаны на этот форум
If you like (and if it is enabled), the forum can convert a series of smilies to images representations of that smiley. This forum recognizes the following smilies and replaces them with images:
To create a list you can use the list tag. You can create 3 types of lists using the list tag.
BBCode can be nested to create more advanced formatting. For example:
produces a code box like this:
When displaying source code you should make sure that you use the code tag. Text displayed with the code tag will use a monospaced font and will not be affected by other tags.
Note: If a username contains the characters [ or ] you can enclose it in quote marks.
produces a quote box like this:
This is the text I want to quote.
If you don't want to quote anyone in particular, you can use the quote tag without specifying a name.
If you want to quote someone, you should use the quote tag.
If you want to display an image you can use the img tag. The text appearing after the "=" sign in the opening tag is used for the alt attribute and should be included whenever possible.
You can create links to other documents or to email addresses using the following tags:
The following tags change the appearance of text:

BBCode is a collection of formatting tags that are used to change the look of text in this forum. BBCode is based on the same principal as, and is very similar to, HTML. Below is a list of all the available BBCodes and instructions on how to use them.
Administrators have the ability to enable or disable BBCode. You can tell if BBCode is enabled or disabled out in the left margin whenever you post a message or edit your signature.
FeatherBB has been fully installed! You may now go to the forum index.
To finalize the installation, you need to click on the button below to download a file called config.php. You then need to upload this file to the root directory of your FeatherBB installation.
Once you have uploaded config.php, FeatherBB will be fully installed! At that point, you may go to the forum index.
FeatherBB has been installed. To finalize the installation please follow the instructions below.

File uploads appear to be disallowed on this server! If you want users to be able to upload their own avatar images you must enable the file_uploads configuration setting in PHP. Once file uploads have been enabled, avatar uploads can be enabled in Administration/Options/Features.

The avatar directory is currently not writable! If you want users to be able to upload their own avatar images you must see to it that the directory %s is writable by PHP. You can later choose to save avatar images in a different directory (see Admin/Options). Use chmod to set the appropriate directory permissions. If in doubt, chmod to 0777.

translations.msgid: This is just a test forum
translations.msgstr: This is just a test forum

The cache directory is currently not writable! In order for FeatherBB to function properly, the directory %s must be writable by PHP. Use chmod to set the appropriate directory permissions. If in doubt, chmod to 0777.
You have successfully installed RunBB, congratulations! Now log in and head over to the administration control panel to configure your forum.
The forums are temporarily down for maintenance. Please try again in a few minutes.
InnoDB does not seem to be enabled. Please choose a database layer that does not have InnoDB support, or enable InnoDB on your MySQL server

A table called '%susers' is already present in the database '%s'. This could mean that FeatherBB is already installed or that another piece of software is installed and is occupying one or more of the table names FeatherBB requires. If you want to install multiple copies of FeatherBB in the same database, you must choose a different table prefix
The table prefix 'sqlite_' is reserved for use by the SQLite engine. Please choose a different prefix
'%s' is not a valid database type

The table prefix '%s' contains illegal characters or is too long. The prefix may contain the letters a to z, any numbers and the underscore character. They must however not start with a number. The maximum length is 40 characters. Please choose a different prefix
Make your forum yours. Choose a language and a style for your board.
Settings for your board. You can change this later.
Enter your board's title and description.
Create the very first account on your board.
Your username should be between 2 and 25 characters long. Your password must be at least 6 characters long. Remember that passwords are case-sensitive.
Your MySQL username and password (ignore of SQLite).
If you want to run multiple FeatherBB installations in a single database, change this.
You should be able to get this info from your web host, if localhost does not work.
Enter your database username and password
Enter the name of your database
The name of the database you want to install FeatherBB on.
Select a database. We support SQLite, MySQL and PostgreSQL.
The following errors need to be corrected:
All information we need to create a connection with your database.
is a required field in this form.

You are about to install FeatherBB. In order to install FeatherBB, you must complete the form set out below. If you encounter any difficulties with the installation, please refer to the documentation.
The URL (without trailing slash) of your FeatherBB forum. This must be correct.
The default style chosen doesn't seem to exist.
This PHP environment does not have support for any of the databases that FeatherBB supports. PHP needs to have support for either MySQL, PostgreSQL or SQLite in order for FeatherBB to be installed.
The default language chosen doesn't seem to exist.
You must enter a board title.
The administrator email address you entered is invalid.
Passwords must be at least 6 characters long.
Usernames may not contain any of the text formatting tags (BBCode) that the forum uses.
Usernames may not contain all the characters ', " and [ or ] at once.
Usernames may not be in the form of an IP address.
Usernames must be at least 2 characters long.
Usernames must not be more than 25 characters long.
It seems like FeatherBB is already installed. You should go here instead.
You are running %1$s version %2$s. FeatherBB %3$s requires at least %1$s %4$s to run properly. You must upgrade your %1$s installation before you can continue.
The language used for this install script. The default language used for the board itself can be set below.
This account has already requested a password reset in the past hour. Please wait %s minutes before requesting a new password again.
An email has been sent to the specified address with instructions on how to change your password. If it does not arrive you can contact the forum administrator at
The following error needs to be corrected before a new password can be sent:
If you have not registered or have forgotten your password click on the appropriate link below.
Log me in automatically each time I visit.
Enter your username and password below
A new password together with a link to activate the new password will be sent to that address.
Enter the email address with which you registered
There is no user registered with the email address
Show more users for this IP
You must select at least one post for split/delete.
First post cannot be selected for split/delete.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected posts?
Are you sure you want to split the selected posts?
Please confirm split of selected posts and select destination of move.
You must select at least two topics for merge.
You must select at least one topic for move/delete/open/close.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected topics?
There are no forums into which you can move topics.
You are not subscribed to this topic.
You are not subscribed to this forum.
Please enter a short reason why you are reporting this post
You are already subscribed to this topic.
You are already subscribed to this forum.
Your message must be under 65535 bytes (~64kb).
At least %s seconds have to pass between reports. Please wait %s seconds and try sending again.
Please note that by using this form, your email address will be disclosed to the recipient.
Write and submit your email message
Messages cannot be longer than 65535 characters (64 KB).
At least %s seconds have to pass between sent emails. Please wait %s seconds and try sending again.
The user you are trying to send an email to has disabled form email.
All topics in the specified forum have been marked as read.
All topics and forums have been marked as read.
Silent edit (don't display "Edited by ..." in topic view)
Edit the post and submit changes
At least %s seconds have to pass between posts. Please wait %s seconds and try posting again.
Never show smilies as icons for this post
The following errors need to be corrected before the message can be posted:
It seems your post consisted of empty BBCodes only. It is possible that this happened because e.g. the innermost quote was discarded because of the maximum quote depth level.
Posts cannot contain only capital letters.
Subjects cannot contain only capital letters.
Posts cannot be longer than %s bytes.
You must enter a message. After applying censoring filters, your message was empty.
Subjects cannot be longer than 70 characters.
Topics must contain a subject. After applying censoring filters, your subject was empty.
Админ не может быть удален. Для удаления перевидите его в другую группу.
Warning! Deleted users and/or posts cannot be restored. If you choose not to delete the posts made by this user, the posts can only be deleted manually at a later time.
Delete any posts and topics this user has made.
Please confirm that you want to delete the user
Choose which forums this user should be allowed to moderate. Note: This only applies to moderators. Administrators always have full permissions in all forums.
When you update your profile, you will be redirected back to this page.
Set your options for viewing posts
If you are on a slow connection, disabling these options, particularly showing images in posts and signatures, will make pages load faster.
Include a plain text version of new posts in subscription notification emails.
Automatically subscribe to every topic you post in.
Leave blank to use forum default.
The quote, code, list, and heading BBCodes are not allowed in signatures.
No signature currently stored in profile.

A signature is a small piece of text that is attached to your posts. In it, you can enter just about anything you like. Perhaps you would like to enter your favourite quote or your star sign. It's up to you! In your signature you can use BBCode if it is allowed in this particular forum. You can see the features that are allowed/enabled listed below whenever you edit your signature.
An avatar is a small image that will be displayed with all your posts. You can upload an avatar by clicking the link below.
You are not allowed to add a website to your profile yet.
The website URL you entered is invalid.
The title you entered contains a forbidden word. You must choose a different title.
Enter an avatar file to upload
An avatar is a small image that will be displayed under your username in your posts. It must not be any bigger than
An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
The server was unable to save the uploaded file. Please contact the forum administrator at
The file you tried to upload is wider and/or higher than the maximum allowed
The file you tried to upload is larger than the maximum allowed
You did not select a file for upload.
The file you tried to upload is not of an allowed type. Allowed types are gif, jpeg and png.
PHP was unable to save the uploaded file to a temporary location.
The selected file was only partially uploaded. Please try again.
The administrator has disabled avatar support.
The selected file was too large to upload. The server didn't allow the upload.
An email will be sent to your new address with an activation link. You must click the link in the email you receive to activate the new address.
An email has been sent to the specified address with instructions on how to activate the new email address. If it doesn't arrive you can contact the forum administrator at
Your email address has been updated.
The specified email activation key was incorrect or has expired. Please re-request change of email address. If that fails, contact the forum administrator at
Passwords must be at least 6 characters long. Passwords are case sensitive.
Enter and confirm your new password
Your password has been updated. You can now login with your new password.
The specified password activation key was incorrect or has expired. Please re-request a new password. If that fails, contact the forum administrator at
Enter the number of topics and posts you wish to view on each page.
Signatures cannot have more than %s lines.
You entered an invalid ICQ UIN. Please go back and correct.
Someone else is already registered with that email address. Please choose another email address.
Signatures cannot be longer than %1$s characters. Please reduce your signature by %2$s characters.
The email address you entered is banned in this forum. Please choose another email address.
The username you entered is banned in this forum. Please choose another username.
Passwords must be at least 6 characters long. Please choose another (longer) password.
Usernames may not contain any of the text formatting tags (BBCode) that the forum uses. Please choose another username.
Usernames may not contain all the characters ', " and [ or ] at once. Please choose another username.
Usernames may not be in the form of an IP address. Please choose another username.
The username guest is reserved. Please choose another username.
Usernames must not be more than 25 characters long. Please choose another (shorter) username.
Usernames must be at least 2 characters long. Please choose another (longer) username.
Hide your email address and disallow form email.
Display your email address to other users.
Hide your email address but allow form email.
Select whether you want your email address to be viewable to other users or not and if you want other users to be able to send you email via the forum (form email) or not.
Daylight Savings Time is in effect (advance time by 1 hour).
For the forum to display times correctly you must select your local time zone. If Daylight Savings Time is in effect you should also check the option provided which will advance times by 1 hour.
Enter and confirm a valid email address
Please enter a username between 2 and 25 characters long
Please enter and confirm your chosen password
Passwords must be at least 6 characters long. Passwords are case sensitive.
You must enter a valid email address as your randomly generated password will be sent to that address.

Registration will grant you access to a number of features and capabilities otherwise unavailable. These functions include the ability to edit and delete posts, design your own signature that accompanies your posts and much more. If you have any questions regarding this forum you should ask an administrator.

Below is a form you must fill out in order to register. Once you are registered you should visit your profile and review the different settings you can change. The fields below only make up a small part of all the settings you can alter in your profile.
Registration complete. You are now logged in.
Thank you for registering. Your password has been sent to the specified address. If it doesn't arrive you can contact the forum administrator at
The username you entered is too similar. The username must differ from that by at least one alphanumerical character (a-z or 0-9). Please choose a different username.
The username you entered contains one or more censored words. Please choose a different username.
Someone is already registered with the username

A new user was registered with the same IP address as you within the last hour. To prevent registration flooding, at least an hour has to pass between registrations from the same IP. Sorry for the inconvenience.
The following errors need to be corrected before you can register:
This forum is not accepting new registrations.
You must agree to the following in order to register
There are no unanswered posts in this forum.
There are no topics with new posts since your last visit.
No new posts have been made within the last 24 hours.
This user is currently not subscribed to any topics.
There are no topics by this user in this forum.
There are no posts by this user in this forum.
You have to enter at least one keyword and/or an author to search for.
You can choose how you wish to sort and show your results.
Select how to view search results
If no forums are selected, all forums will be searched.
Choose in which forum you would like to search and if you want to search in topic subjects, message text or both.

To search by keyword, enter a term or terms to search for. Separate terms with spaces. Use AND, OR and NOT to refine your search. To search by author enter the username of the author whose posts you wish to search for. Use wildcard character * for partial matches.
You do not have permission to use the search feature.
At least %s seconds have to pass between searches. Please wait %s seconds and try searching again.
Accept default for English forums otherwise the character set of the primary language pack.

Current character set: If the primary language in your forum is English, you can leave this at the default value. However, if your forum is non-English, you should enter the character set of the primary language pack used in the forum. Getting this wrong can corrupt your database so don't just guess! Note: This is required even if the old database is UTF-8.

Enable conversion: When enabled this update script will, after it has made the required structural changes to the database, convert all text in the database from the current character set to UTF-8. This conversion is required if you're upgrading from version 1.2.

IMPORTANT! FluxBB has detected that this PHP environment does not have support for the encoding mechanisms required to do UTF-8 conversion from character sets other than ISO-8859-1. What this means is that if the current character set is not ISO-8859-1, FluxBB won't be able to convert your forum database to UTF-8 and you will have to do it manually. Instructions for doing manual charset conversion can be found in the update instructions.
Did you read the update instructions in the documentation? If not, start there.

This script will update your forum database. The update procedure might take anything from a second to hours depending on the speed of the server and the size of the forum database. Don't forget to make a backup of the database before continuing.
Your forum is already as up-to-date as this script can make it
It appears the update script is already being ran by someone else. If this is not the case, please manually delete the file '%s' and try again
Invalid database password. To upgrade FluxBB you must enter your database password exactly as it appears in your '%s'
Invalid database file name. When using SQLite the database file name must be entered exactly as it appears in your '%s'
Version mismatch. The database '%s' doesn't seem to be running a FluxBB database schema supported by this update script.
You are running %1$s version %2$s. FluxBB %3$s requires at least %1$s %4$s to run properly. You must upgrade your %1$s installation before you can continue.
The message that will be displayed to users during the updating process. This text will not be parsed like regular posts and thus may contain HTML.
If you are running SQLite (and hence have no database password) please use the database file name instead. This must exactly match the database file name given in your configuration file.
To perform the database update please enter the database password with which FluxBB was installed. If you cannot remember, this is stored in your 'config.php' file.
This step is for the board administrator only!
This process is for board administrators only. If you are a member there is nothing to worry about - the forums will be back shortly!
Your FluxBB database is out-of-date and must be upgraded in order to continue. If you are the board administrator, please follow the instructions below to complete the upgrade.
There was an error converting some users. This can occur when converting from FluxBB v1.2 if multiple users have registered with very similar usernames, for example "bob" and "böb".
Below is a list of users who failed to convert. Please choose a new username for each user. Users who are renamed will automatically be sent an email alerting them of the change.
The following errors need to be corrected:
Your forum database was successfully updated. You may now %s.
Unable to write update lock. Please make sure PHP has write access to the directory '%s' and no-one else is currently running the update script.
Usernames must be at least 2 characters long. Please choose another (longer) username.
Usernames must not be more than 25 characters long. Please choose another (shorter) username.
The username guest is reserved. Please choose another username.
Usernames may not be in the form of an IP address. Please choose another username.
Usernames may not contain all the characters ', " and [ or ] at once. Please choose another username.
Usernames may not contain any of the text formatting tags (BBCode) that the forum uses. Please choose another username.

Someone is already registered with the username %s. The username you entered is too similar. The username must differ from that by at least one alphanumerical character (a-z or 0-9). Please choose a different username.
Enter a username to search for and/or a user group to filter by. The username field can be left blank. Use the wildcard character * for partial matches.
Sort users by name, date registered or number of posts and in ascending/descending order.

mailTemplates.text:
Subject: Добро пожаловать на <board_title>!

Спасибо за регистрацию на форумах <base_url>. Детали Вашей учетной записи:

Пользователь: <username>
Пароль: <password>

Перейдите по ссылке <login_url> для активации учетной записи.

--  
<board_mailer> Mailer
(Письмо создано автоматически и отвечать на него не нужно)

Subject: Аккаун переименован

During an upgrade to the forums at <base_url> it was determined your username is too similar to an existing user. Your username has been changed accordingly.

Old username: <old_username>
New username: <new_username>

We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

--  
<board_mailer> Mailer
(Письмо создано автоматически и отвечать на него не нужно)

Subject: Внимание - новая регистрация

User '<username>' registered in the forums at <base_url>

User profile: <profile_url>

To administer this account, please visit the following page:
<admin_url>

--  
<board_mailer> Mailer
(Письмо создано автоматически и отвечать на него не нужно)

Subject: New topic in forum: '<forum_name>'

<poster> has posted a new topic '<topic_subject>' in the forum '<forum_name>', to which you are subscribed.

The topic is located at <topic_url>

The message reads as follows:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

<message>

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

You can unsubscribe by going to <unsubscribe_url>

--  
<board_mailer> Mailer
(Письмо создано автоматически и отвечать на него не нужно)

Subject: Report(<forum_id>) - '<topic_subject>'

User '<username>' has reported the following message: <post_url>

Reason: <reason>

--

(Письмо создано автоматически и отвечать на него не нужно)

Subject: New password requested

Hello <username>,

You have requested to have a new password assigned to your account in the discussion forum at <base_url>. If you didn't request this or if you don't want to change your password you should just ignore this message. Only if you visit the activation page below will your password be changed.

Your new password is: <new_password>

To change your password, please visit the following page:
<activation_url>

--  
<board_mailer> Mailer
(Письмо создано автоматически и отвечать на него не нужно)

Subject: Запрос смены email адреса

Привет <username>,

You have requested to have a new email address assigned to your account in the discussion forum at <base_url>. If you didn't request this or if you don't want to change your email address you should just ignore this message. Only if you visit the activation page below will your email address be changed. In order for the activation page to work, you must be logged in to the forum.

Для смены email, пройдите по ссылке:
<activation_url>

--  
<board_mailer> Mailer
(Письмо создано автоматически и отвечать на него не нужно)
